thread.title: Everything to Know About the Selena Gomez-Bella Hadid-Weeknd Love Triangle (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: Everything to Know About the Selena Gomez-Bella Hadid-Weeknd Love Triangle (PHOTOS)

author: Ariana Romero
title: Everything to Know About the Selena Gomez-Bella Hadid-Weeknd Love Triangle (PHOTOS)
text:
A post shared by The Weeknd (@theweeknd) on Feb 24, 2017 at 7:13pm PST Selena Was at The Weeknd's Concert Advertisement 
Selena cheered on her BF at a concert in Amsterdam on February 24, sharing snaps backstage and in the audience. According to an Us Weekly source, Selena flew there just to see the "Starboy" cutie and plans on hitting up more stops along the way. Bella’s BFF may have thrown shade Wait sorry, WHO could possibly be cuter than @bellahadid .... literally nobody. https://t.co/GqOieih2g6 — Hailey Baldwin (@haileybaldwin) January 31, 2017 Bella’s BFF may have thrown shade Advertisement 
Bella’s pal Hailey Baldwin tweeted, “Wait sorry, WHO could possibly be cuter than @bellahadid .... literally nobody,” after the Weeknd’s ex-girlfriend starred in an adorable W magazine video. 
It’s possible Hailey was simply supporting her friend. And it’s possible Hailey was throwing shade at Selena Gomez. Bella was rolling “suspicious smelling cigarettes” Jan 26, 2017 at 12:12pm PST Bella was rolling “suspicious smelling cigarettes” Advertisement 
The model, 20, reportedly started partying up a storm after her ex-boyfriend and Selena were spotted traipsing throughout Europe together (more on that on the next page). 
“Bella was with a bunch of young hipsters and they were rolling [suspicious smelling cigarettes] up and smoking them right in the open,” an insider tells RadarOnline.com of a Tuesday, January 31, fashion party in NYC. Selena and The Weeknd spent a fortune in Italy The Weeknd and Selena Gomez out in Venice, Italy pic.twitter.com/uTVtYlDG5S — The Weeknd Direct (@TheWeekndDirect) February 1, 2017 Selena and The Weeknd spent a fortune in Italy Advertisement 
The happy new couple doesn’t seem to care about any possible hate from Bella & Co., since they just spent nearly a quarter of a million dollars on a European vacation. 
The duo stayed in Florence’s Belmond Villa San Michele, which is so exclusive Kim Kardashian and Kanye West spent their honeymoon there. 
Selena, 24, and The Weeknd, 26, dropped at least $205,000 on their boat-and-art-filled Italian getaway, if not up to $246,402, E! News reports. Selena and the Weeknd will attend the Grammys together Selena and the Weeknd will attend the Grammys together Advertisement 
Selena is ready to support her man at the 2017 Grammys, where he will perform with Daft Punk. 
The Weeknd has reportedly requested Selena sits next to him during the ceremony and officially put her down as his plus-one for Clive Davis’s famed after-party. 
While SelGo’s ex-boyfriend Justin Bieber is nominated for four awards, there will be no awkward run-ins as the Biebs will not attend the show this year. Selena could be pregnant Selena could be pregnant Advertisement 
“She’s [dropped] several hints that she’s expecting, complaining to those close to her that she’s too tired to stay out and that she feels nauseous,” a talkative “friend” claims to Life & Style . 
“When she’s not nauseous, though, she’s having weird cravings, and she can’t stop eating ice cream!” 
Selena hasn’t commented on the wild speculation, so file this one under “total rumors” for now. Selena and The Weeknd are Instagram official Jan 30, 2017 at 5:51am PST Selena and The Weeknd are Instagram official Advertisement 
Selena and her new boyfriend are Instagram official... kinda. 
The singer posted a cute 'Gram video of The Weeknd mean mugging on a boat, adding the heart-eyes emoji for a caption. 
Then she deleted the Venice, Italy-set clip after a few hours. 
Sorry, Selena, screenshots live forever. Selena and The Weeknd are now following each other on Instagram Aug 1, 2016 at 9:00am PDT Selena and The Weeknd are now following each other on Instagram Advertisement 
Just a few days later they went Instagram official. Selena and The Weeknd have possibly been dating for a year Selena and The Weeknd have possibly been dating for a year Advertisement 
Selena and her supposedly “new” boyfriend have been “secretly seeing each other for more than a year,” In Touch claims. 
That would mean the “Secrets” singer dated both Selena and ex-girlfriend Bella at the exact same time for months, until he split from the model in November 2016. 
No one involved in the love triangle has commented on this bombshell of a rumor yet, so it’s just speculation right now. Selena and The Weeknd have a “sexy” relationship Selena and The Weeknd have a “sexy” relationship Advertisement 
Those close to the couple are refuting the idea of a year-long Selena-Weeknd relationship. 
"As of now, they are just having fun and enjoying each other," a pal tells E! News of the duo, adding the performers are in the “early stages” of dating. 
"He really likes her. They text every day," the insider adds. "They have a really sexy and flirty relationship.” Selena and The Weeknd go on a date at a John Mayer concert A photo posted by Allie Teilz (@allieteilz) on Jan 20, 2017 at 3:07am PST Selena and The Weeknd go on a date at a John Mayer concert Advertisement 
While out at a club in Silver Lake, California, the pair ran into John Mayer, who performed an impromptu concert for the club's guests. The "Gravity" crooner even tried handing the mic off to the "Starboy" singer but he declined. 
We wonder what John's ex/Selena's BFF Taylor Swift would think of this run-in? The Weeknd Is hanging out with Kylie Jenner — Golden Girl Habibi (@ILOVE_YOou_ABEL) June 29, 2015 The Weeknd Is hanging out with Kylie Jenner Advertisement 
Does Selena have something to worry about? The Weeknd was spotted dining with the youngest Kardashian-Jenner in NYC on Tuesday, January 17. But, nothing fishy was going on there! The Toronto superstar was simply the third wheel on a Kylie-Tyga date night. Bella is “pissed” Jan 17, 2017 at 1:30pm PST Bella is “pissed” Advertisement 
Gigi Hadid’s little sister isn’t happy about her ex’s new relationship. 
“Bella and Abel’s split wasn’t dramatic, but of course she’s hurt and pissed that he’s moved on so quickly with Selena,” a pals tells People of The Weeknd, who was born Abel Tesfaye. 
Despite Bella’s dissatisfaction with the singer’s rebound, the 20-year-old model was actually the one to break up with the “Starboy” performer, insiders claim. Bella and Selena aren't even that close S Q A U D ⚡️ pic.twitter.com/CNHrmJ0sOr — Immy Waterhouse (@ImmyWaterhouse) September 22, 2015 Bella and Selena aren't even that close Advertisement 
Though sources close to Bella report that the model is feeling truly betrayed by Selena striking up a romance with her former flame, sources in Selena's camp say the two were never even really friends. Though Selena is a staple in Taylor Swift's squad, the "Good For You" singer and the Hadid sisters are merely acquaintances, a source tells TMZ . 
The source also claims that if Bella and Selena were closer, she would of course ask the model for her blessing to date her ex, but in reality, the pair aren't even close. Bella is giving the middle finger Jan 13, 2017 at 10:49pm PST Bella is giving the middle finger Advertisement 
While walking around New York City, the brunette beauty flipped off members of the papparazzi who continued to press her on the love triangle. 
"I feel fine," she icily told one photographer. 
Bella later posted a pic of her giving the middle finger to Instagram, which many fans argue is a message to Selena. Ouch! Bella unfollowed Selena on Instagram A video posted by Bella Hadid (@bellahadid) on Jan 12, 2017 at 4:32pm PST Bella unfollowed Selena on Instagram Advertisement 
Hours after photos leaked of Selena smooching The Weeknd, Bella took to Instagram to unfollow the "Hands to Myself" singer in what fans are calling a shady move from the fashion model. Selena and The Weeknd went on a three-hour date Selena and The Weeknd went on a three-hour date Advertisement 
It all started when the giddy pop stars were spotted arm-in-arm outside Giorgio Baldi in Los Angeles after a three-hour-long date. While waiting for their cars, the pair packed on some major PDA, locking lips for all to see. Though fans squealed at the prospect of a new Hollywood couple, Bella does not seem too keen. Bella still loves The Weeknd Bella still loves The Weeknd Advertisement 
A source tells E! News that though the model is putting on a brave front, she's still in love with the "Starboy" singer. 
"She is actually not over The Weeknd. She still loves him," the source said. "They are on fine terms, but she is bitter about the romance with Selena. She was not happy when all of that gossip went everywhere between The Weeknd and Selena." 
The source continued, "It really hurt her seeing Selena be all up on her man. She still feels like they have a connection." The Weeknd always had a thing for Selena ???? A photo posted by The Weeknd (@theweeknd) on Jan 8, 2017 at 1:47pm PST The Weeknd always had a thing for Selena Advertisement 
"The Hills" crooner has apparently always had a thing for the "Come & Get It" songstress, gushing to friends that he thinks the former Disney Channel star is sexy and talented. 
"Abel though always had a thing for Selena," a source tells E! News . "He thinks she is extremely talented and sexy. They recently started talking before the holidays but she has been on his radar before." The new couple is taking things slow The new couple is taking things slow Advertisement 
Despite the immense amount of buzz surrounding the hot new couple, sources close to them say the young stars are taking things slow. 
"They are on the same level with expectations and think the other is really fun. They are taking things slow and getting to know each other," a source tells E! News .
